Use a traditional alarm clock: If you have an alarm clock, you can set it to go off at the desired time to wake up in the morning.
Use a timer: You can set a timer on your kitchen or bathroom timer to go off at the desired time to wake up in the morning.
Use a bell or whistle: You can place a bell or whistle in a strategic location near your bed, and when the alarm goes off, you can use it to wake yourself up.
Use a sunrise simulation: You can use a sunrise simulation alarm clock, which gradually brightens the room with a warm, natural light, simulating a sunrise and helping you wake up naturally.
Use a smart light bulb: You can use a smart light bulb that can be controlled through an app, and set it to turn on at a specific time to simulate a sunrise and wake you up.
